Title: Object: Combat de Benouth
Series: Galerie du Palais Royal
Description: Castle at Benouth set on fire by the French under General Belliard, Mosel soldiers attempting escape cut down by French riflemen. Lithograph
Producer name: Print made by: J P Quénot (direxit)
Curator's comments: For comment on the series see 1860,0728.199.
Associated names: Associated with: General Augustin Daniel Belliard
Associated events: Associated Event: Napoleon's campaign in Egypt 1799
